title: Selected Projects for Responsible AI themed Projects under Safe & Trusted AI This initiative is a part of the Safe & Trusted AI Pillar within the IndiaAI Mission, which seeks to advance the responsible development, deployment, and adoption of AI by developing indigenous tools and frameworks, self-assessment checklists for innovators, and other guidelines and governance frameworks. The following projects have been selected: Name of the Theme Title of the Project Machine Unlearning Unlearning in Generative Foundation Models Development of Method for Generating Synthetic Data for Mitigating Bias Framework for Mitigating Learning Pipeline for National Institute of Technology Raipur Responsible Artificial Intelligence for Bias Mitigation in Health Care ID_2053 Explainable AI Defence Institute of Enabling Explainable and Privacy Preserving Technology (DIAT),
